articles.author: Ryan Browne
articles.title: Microsoft offers to sell Office without Teams to placate EU regulators - CNBC
articles.description: Microsoft offered to unbundle its Office 365 and Microsoft 365 software suites from its Teams workplace communication app to address competition concerns from European regulators.
articles.content: Microsoft on Friday made fresh commitments to unbundle its Office 365 and Microsoft 365 software suites from its Teams workplace communication app in an effort to address competition concerns from Eu… [+2374 chars]

articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.title: Apple blocks Fortnite’s App Store return as downloads fail in Europe - The Verge
articles.description: Epic says that Fortnite is ‘offline’ on iPhones everywhere, including the Epic Games Store in the EU, after Apple rejected its App Store resubmission.
articles.content:
Epic says that the game is offline on iPhones everywhere after Apple rejected its App Store resubmission.
